name: Pixel Tank 3D - Multiplayer Shooter
description:
Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else all around the world! You can create and customize your tank using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield!

*** MULTIPLAYER ***

Multiplayer mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE
• unique map
• Varied weaponry
• Up to 10 players in one game.
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!
• Classic Deathmatch

MAIN FEATURES:
• Completely different world with tonnes of different locations.
• Unique types of weapons.
• Colorful comic book plot which tells us the story behind Pixel Gun.  
• Endless gameplay.
• Awards for getting through to the next stage.
• Get the best results you can and compare them to your friends!  
 • You can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!
Thank you for all the comments and advice, we really appreciate it. In this version, we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the coming updates with cool new features!
• Great HD graphics.
• Exciting sound effects.
Join the exciting world of Pixel Tank 3D!

——————————————————————————————————
